trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 使用者入門

trans-unit.source: Find resources to learn how to build .NET Core applications on Windows, Linux and macOS.
trans-unit.target: 尋找資源以了解如何在 Windows、Linux 和 macOS 上建置 .NET Core 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core

trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 使用者入門

trans-unit.source: .NET Core runs on [Windows](#windows), [Linux](#linux), and [macOS / OS X](#os-x--macos).
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 可在 [Windows](#windows)、[Linux](#linux) 和 [macOS / OS X](#os-x--macos) 上執行。

trans-unit.source: Windows
trans-unit.target: Windows

trans-unit.source: Install .NET Core on [Windows](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#windows).
trans-unit.target: 在 [Windows](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#windows) 上安裝 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: 遵循這些逐步教學課程就可以開始開發 .NET Core 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: [Building a C# Hello World Application with .NET Core in Visual Studio 2017](../csharp/getting-started/with-visual-studio-2017.md) - Learn to to build, debug, and publish a simple .NET Core console application using Visual Studio 2017.
trans-unit.target: [在 Visual Studio 2017 中使用 .NET Core 建置 C# Hello World 應用程式](../csharp/getting-started/with-visual-studio-2017.md) - 了解如何使用 Visual Studio 2017 建置、偵錯和發行簡單的 .NET Core 主控台應用程式。

trans-unit.source: [Building a class library with C# and .NET Core in Visual Studio 2017](../csharp/getting-started/library-with-visual-studio-2017.md) - Learn how to build a class library written in C# using Visual Studio 2017
trans-unit.target: [在 Visual Studio 2017 中使用 C# 和 .NET Core 建置類別庫](../csharp/getting-started/library-with-visual-studio-2017.md) - 了解如何使用 Visual Studio 2017 建置以 C# 撰寫的類別庫

trans-unit.source: [Get started with Visual Studio Code using C# and .NET Core on Windows](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-using-CSharp-and-NET-Core) - This [Channel9](https://channel9.msdn.com) video shows you how to install and use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor, to create your first console application in .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: [Get started with Visual Studio Code using C# and .NET Core on Windows](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-using-CSharp-and-NET-Core) (在 Windows 上使用 C# 和 .NET Core 開始使用 Visual Studio Code) - 此 [Channel&9;](https://channel9.msdn.com) 影片會示範如何安裝和使用 Microsoft 的輕量型跨平台程式碼編輯器 [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs)，建立您第一個 .NET Core 主控台應用程式。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) (使用命令列開始使用 .NET Core)：使用任何程式碼編輯器與 [.NET Core 跨平台命令列介面 (CLI)](tools/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: See the [Prerequisites for Windows development](windows-prerequisites.md) topic for a list of the supported Windows versions.
trans-unit.target: 如需支援的 Windows 版本清單，請參閱 [Prerequisites for Windows development](windows-prerequisites.md) (Windows 開發的必要條件) 主題。

trans-unit.source: Linux
trans-unit.target: Linux

trans-unit.source: Install .NET Core on your distribution/version:
trans-unit.target: 在您的散發/版本上安裝 .NET Core：

trans-unit.source: [Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Server](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxredhat)
trans-unit.target: [Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 伺服器](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxredhat)

trans-unit.source: [Ubuntu 14.04, 16.04 & Linux Mint 17](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxubuntu)
trans-unit.target: [Ubuntu 14.04、16.04 及 Linux Mint 17](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxubuntu)

trans-unit.source: [Debian 8.2](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxdebian)
trans-unit.target: [Debian 8.2](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxdebian)

trans-unit.source: [Fedora 23](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxfedora)
trans-unit.target: [Fedora 23](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxfedora)

trans-unit.source: [CentOS 7.1 & Oracle Linux 7.1](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxcentos)
trans-unit.target: [CentOS 7.1 及 Oracle Linux 7.1](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxcentos)

trans-unit.source: [openSUSE 13.2](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxopensuse)
trans-unit.target: [openSUSE 13.2](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#linuxopensuse)

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: 遵循這些逐步教學課程就可以開始開發 .NET Core 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) (使用命令列開始使用 .NET Core)：使用任何程式碼編輯器與 [.NET Core 跨平台命令列介面 (CLI)](tools/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: [Get started with VS Code using C# and .NET Core on Ubuntu](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-Csharp-dotnet-Core-Ubuntu) - This [Channel9](https://channel9.msdn.com) video shows you how to install and use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor, to create your first console application in .NET Core on Ubuntu 14.04.
trans-unit.target: [Get started with VS Code using C# and .NET Core on Ubuntu](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-Csharp-dotnet-Core-Ubuntu) (在 Ubuntu 上使用 C# 和 .NET Core 開始使用 VS Code) - 此 [Channel 9](https://channel9.msdn.com) 影片會示範如何安裝和使用 Microsoft 的輕量型跨平台程式碼編輯器 [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs)，在 Ubuntu 14.04 上建立您第一個 .NET Core 主控台應用程式。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported by the Linux distributions and versions listed above in the installation links.
trans-unit.target: 上列安裝連結中列出的 Linux 散發及版本都支援 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: OS X / macOS
trans-unit.target: OS X / macOS

trans-unit.source: Install .NET Core for [macOS](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#macos).
trans-unit.target: 安裝 .NET Core for [macOS](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#macos)。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported on OS X El Capitan (version 10.11) and macOS Sierra (version 10.12).
trans-unit.target: OS X El Capitan (10.11 版) 及 macOS Sierra (10.12 版) 支援 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: You can get started developing .NET Core apps by following these step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: 遵循這些逐步教學課程就可以開始開發 .NET Core 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: [Get started with VS Code using C# and .NET Core on macOS](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-using-CSharp-and-NET-Core-on-MacOS) - This [Channel9](https://channel9.msdn.com) video shows you how to install and use [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs), Microsoft's lightweight cross-platform code editor, to create your first console application in .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: [Get started with VS Code using C# and .NET Core on macOS](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/dotnet/Get-started-with-VS-Code-using-CSharp-and-NET-Core-on-MacOS) (在 macOS 上使用 C# 和 .NET Core 開始使用 VS Code) - 此 [Channel&9;](https://channel9.msdn.com) 影片會示範如何安裝和使用 Microsoft 的輕量型跨平台程式碼編輯器 [Visual Studio Code](https://www.visualstudio.com/products/code-vs)，建立您第一個 .NET Core 主控台應用程式。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) - A tour of the steps and workflow to create a .NET Core Solution using VS Code that includes unit tests, third-party libraries and how to use the debugging tools.
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core on macOS, using Visual Studio Code](tutorials/using-on-macos.md) (在 macOS 上開始使用 .NET Core，使用 Visual Studio Code)：這是使用 VS Code 建立 .NET Core 解決方案的教學步驟和工作流程，所用的 VS Code 包括了單元測試、協力廠商程式庫及偵錯工具的使用方法。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) - Use any code editor with the [.NET Core cross-platform command-line interface (CLI)](tools/index.md).
trans-unit.target: [Getting started with .NET Core using the command-line](tutorials/using-with-xplat-cli.md) (使用命令列開始使用 .NET Core)：使用任何程式碼編輯器與 [.NET Core 跨平台命令列介面 (CLI)](tools/index.md)。
